attributes.action: Request Mr Stephen Wilson to cease the practise of releasing squirrels into Regents Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Wilson has for some time being training squirrels to act as pick pockets and releasing them into Regents park to prey on tourists and locals alike.  I have personally lost a watch and a sherbet fountain to these furry louts and would request something is done about this.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
